name: 02_country_by_ip
description: This task is based on a real case study. At one time, we were doing a service where we had to determine from what point a user was knocking on the endpoint, and then offer him the appropriate logic for the application. A trivial example: a Frenchman wants to see prices in euros instead of dollars, and an American doesn't need Japanese yen.
author: Oleksii Obabko
